prompt: Can you please make a list of the common timezone names, and map these to the identifiers from the tz-database.
response:
## Common Timezone Names & TZ Database Identifiers

This list is not exhaustive, but covers many commonly used timezone names. 

**Please Note:** Some common names can refer to multiple identifiers, especially when daylight saving time (DST) is involved. Always verify the specific identifier for accuracy.

| Common Name                        | TZ Database Identifier(s)                 |
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| Coordinated Universal Time         | UTC                                      |
| Greenwich Mean Time                | GMT, Etc/GMT                            |
| Universal Time                     | UT, Etc/UTC                             | 
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| **North America**                   |                                            |
| Pacific Standard Time              | America/Los_Angeles, PST8PDT, US/Pacific |
| Mountain Standard Time             | America/Denver, MST7MDT, US/Mountain    |
| Central Standard Time              | America/Chicago, CST6CDT, US/Central   |
| Eastern Standard Time              | America/New_York, EST5EDT, US/Eastern   |
| Atlantic Standard Time             | America/Halifax, AST4ADT                |
| Newfoundland Standard Time         | America/St_Johns, NST3:30NDT            |
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| **Europe**                          |                                            |
| Western European Time              | WET, Europe/London, GMT/BST               |
| Central European Time              | CET, Europe/Berlin, Europe/Paris         |
| Eastern European Time              | EET, Europe/Warsaw                        |
| Moscow Standard Time               | MSK, Europe/Moscow                       |
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| **Asia**                            |                                            |
| China Standard Time               | CST, Asia/Shanghai                       |
| Japan Standard Time               | JST, Asia/Tokyo                         |
| Korea Standard Time               | KST, Asia/Seoul                          |
| India Standard Time               | IST, Asia/Kolkata                        |
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| **Australia**                      |                                            |
| Australian Western Standard Time | AWST, Australia/Perth                    |
| Australian Central Standard Time | ACST, Australia/Adelaide, Australia/Darwin |
| Australian Eastern Standard Time | AEST, Australia/Brisbane, Australia/Sydney |
|------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|

This list should give you a good starting point. For a complete list of all available timezones, please refer to the IANA Time Zone Database: https://www.iana.org/time-zones.
